name: Dragon Ball Z - Supersonic Warriors 2 [NDS]
description:
Smashing Sequel Puts Full Power of Nintendo DS in Your Hands!

Features
• Power up 3-on-3 team battles with original moves, improved fighting
systems and more than 30 characters to choose from!
• Assemble a team
that will defeat all others, with high-powered Team Special Attacks!
•
Explore more "what-if" scenarios in unique Story Mode for nearly endless
replayability!
